last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: A final attempt to put a stop to Lim's ambitions comes with profound consequences. Gon travels far and wide in search of Tae-eul.

name: The King: Eternal Monarch
overview: Korean emperor Lee Gon tries to close the doors to a parallel world which was opened by demons; a detective tries to protect the people and the one she loves.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lee Gon mourns the tragic death of his father. Lee Lim goes on the run — and finds escape when he comes across a door to a parallel universe.

guest_stars.character: Lee Ho (the late emperor, Lee Gon's father)
guest_stars.name: Kwon Yul

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Gon insists he is an emperor from another world. An incredulous Jeong Tae-eul takes him to the police station, where he sees a familiar face.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Though Tae-eul finds Gon's story difficult to believe, some things about him are completely inexplicable. At work, she gets busy with a murder case.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When Tae-eul loses her police badge, she can't help but think about Gon. Meanwhile, Kang Sin-jae has had it with his mother's bad habits.

guest_stars.character: Lee Ho (the late emperor, Lee Gon's father)
guest_stars.name: Kwon Yul

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Being introduced to Gon's world is a lot to process for Tae-eul, who's taken to the palace. A disgruntled Jo Yeong keeps an eye on her.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A potential military conflict threatens the kingdom. Gon promises Tae-eul he will return to her, and steps forward to take care of the situation.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Gon brings Yeong along on his trip back to Tae-eul. He has a favor to ask of her, while she's found something troubling to share with him.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In Corea, Luna is set free. In Korea, Gon and Yeong run into a man who recognizes them, and Sin-jae experiences childhood flashbacks.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Gon draws closer to tracking down Lim, and asks Jo Eun-sup to trade places with Yeong. Mail from an unknown sender bothers Koo Seo-ryeong.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: On Lunar New Year, Gon and Lim come face-to-face in a public standoff. Tae-eul opens up to Sin-jae about the other world and her ongoing case.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A compelling offer finds its way to Luna. Gon's investigation into a devastating murder leads him to an old traitor and a clearer idea of Lim's schemes.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Frightening circumstances land Tae-eul back in Gon's arms. When Yeong runs into a woman who looks strikingly familiar, he follows her.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Knowing Seo-ryeong is up to no good, Gon throws her in a tight spot. Upon returning to her world, Tae-eul realizes Luna is there, too.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Gon and Tae-eul are separated when he sets out to fulfill what's been his fate all along. Sin-jae makes a startling discovery.

guest_stars.character: Lee Ho (the late emperor, Lee Gon's father)
guest_stars.name: Kwon Yul

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Lim plots his next meeting with Gon. Understanding there's only one thing he can do to right wrongs, Gon comes to a heart-wrenching decision.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A final attempt to put a stop to Lim's ambitions comes with profound consequences. Gon travels far and wide in search of Tae-eul.
